name: Tranist Diodes
text: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

name: Neural Motivator
text: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to draw 1 action card.

name: Dacxive Animators
text:
After 1 of your ground forces is destroyed during combat, you may place that unit on this card.
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to place any number of units from it onto a planet you control.

name: Hyper Motabolism
text: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token.

name: Psychoarchaeology
text:
You may exhaust this card to use technology specialties on planets you control without exhausting them, even if those planets are exhausted.
You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your planets that has a technology specialty.

name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
text: At the start of your turn, exhaust this card and remove one of your structures from the board to choose a planet controlled by another player that is in or adjacent to a system where you have ships. Destroy all ground forces on that planet.

name: Bio-Stems
text: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready 1 of your other technologies.

name: Plasma Scoring
text: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability, you may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.

name: Magen Defence Grid
text: After a player activates a system that contains a planet you control, each planet you control in that system gains the SPACE CANNON 6 ability as if it were a unit until the end of that player's turn.

name: Duranium Armor
text:
During each round of combat, after you assign hits to your units, repair one participating damaged units that did not use SUSTAIN DAMAGE during this combat round.
You may exhaust this tech before assigning hits; Your units cannot be targeted by "Direct Hit" during this combat round.

name: Graviton Laser Systems
text:
You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.
You may exhaust this card at the start of a space combat round; hits produced by your units this round must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

name: Self Assembly Routines
text:
After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, you may exhaust this card to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.
After 1 of your mechs is destroyed, gain 1 trade good.

name: Fleet Logistics
text: Once during your turn in the action phase, after you perform an action, you may perform an additional action.

name: Sarween Tools
text: When you produce 1 or more units, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

name: Integrated Economy
text: When your perform a tactical action: Treat each planet in the active system as if they are a unit with PRODUCTION X, where X is equal to the sum of the planet's resource and influence values. Planets granted PRODUCTION by this tech may only produce fighters or infantry,

name: Predictive Intelligence
text:
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to redistribute your command tokens.
When you redistribute your command tokens, you may convert all your commodities into trade goods.

name: L4 Disruptors
text: During an invasion, your opponents cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
text: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

name: Exotrieme II
text:
When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 1 additional hit.
After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.

name: Advacned Carrier II
text:
Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 2, Capacity 8
SUSTAIN DAMANGE.

name: Spec Ops II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 6
When you gain control of a planet, if the number of infantry you have on the planet is greater than the planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.

name: Instinct Training
text: You may exhaust this card when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

name: Nullification Field
text: After another player activated a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

name: E-Res Siphons
text: After another player activates a system that contain 1 or more of your ships, gain 3 trade goods.

name: Production Biomes
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to gain 3 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 1 trade good.

name: Transparasteel Plating
text: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards, exhaust technology cards, or use the SPACE CANNON ability of their units against your units.

name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7, Move 2
This unit may move without being transported.
Each fighter in excess of your ship's capacity counts as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

name: Super Dreadnaught II
text:
Cost 4, Combat 4, Move 2, Capacity 2
BOMBARDMENT 4, SUSTAIN DAMAGE
When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 1 additional hit.
Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Inheritance Sysytems
text: You may exhaust this card when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

name: Lazax Gate Folding
text: During your tactical actions, treat Mecatol Rex's system as if it contains each non-delta wormhole.

name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
text: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the reousrce and influence values of 1 planet your control during the use of PRODUCTION.

name: Chaos Mapping
text:
Other players cannon move into asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your units.
At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in an asteroid field that contains at least 1 of your units that has PRODUCTION.

name: Floating Factory II
text:
Move 2, Capacity 6
PRODUCTION 7
This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet.
This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship.
If this unit is blockaded it is destroyed.

name: Protoype War Sun II
text:
Cost 10, Combat 3(x3), Move 3, Capacity 8
BOMBARDMENT 3(x3), SUSTAIN DAMAGE
Other players units in this system lose the PLANETARY SHIELD ability.

name: Impluse Core
text: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

name: Bioplasmosis
text: ACTION: You may exhaust this card to remove any number of ground forces from the board and place them on one or more planets you control in the same or adjacent system.

name: Letani Warrior II
text:
Cost 1, Combat 7
PRODUCTION 2
When you gain control of a planet, if the number of infantry you have on the planet is greater than the planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.

name: Wormhole Generator
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

name: Saturn Engine II
text:
Cost 2, Combat 6, Move 3, Capacity 2
SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Genetic Recombination
text: You may exhaust this card before another player casts votes; exhaust 3 of that players' planets to cast votes for the outcome of your choice. That player cannot exhaust any other planets on that agenda. If this card is not exhausted, you may cast 2 additional votes for each player that has abstained.

name: Crimson Legionnaire II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7
After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
When you gain control of a planet, if the number of infantry you have on the planet is greater than the planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.

name: Memoria II
text:
Cost 8, Combat 5(x2), Move 2, Capacity 6
ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 5(x3), BOMBARDMENT 5
You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain 1 or more of your mechs.

name: War Sun
text:
Cost 12, Combat 3(x3), Move 2, Capacity 8
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3)
Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Cruiser 2
text:
Cost 2, Combat 6, Move 3, Capacity 1
While your cruisers participate in combat, opponent's ships apply -1 to their combat rolls.

name: Dreadnought II
text:
Cost 4, Combat 5, Move 2, Capacity 1
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 5
When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 1 additional hits.

name: Carrier II
text: Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 2, Capacity 6.

name: Fighter II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 8, Move 2
This unit may move whiteout being transported.
Fighters in excess of your ship's capacity count against your fleet pool.

name: Infantry II
text:
Cost 1(x2), Combat 7
When you gain control of a planet, if the number of infantry you have on the planet is greater than the planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.

name: Space Dock II
text:
PRODUCTION X
This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 5 more than the resource value of this planet.
Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ship's capacity.
When you use this unit's PRODUCTION ability, you may place the produced units on any planet in this system.
